intro.content: This project was created as part of a semester-ending project for the subject 'Internet of Things.'

spmList.name: Pumps water to the plant based on moisture data
Synced with a custom made Android App

description.content: The project's goal was to develop a one-stop solution for all plant lovers living in urban and semi-urban areas to ensure that their plants received all of the necessary nutrients without their owners having to worry about their leafy little friends. I also wrote an android that would subscribe the topic that the ESP publishes on, the code for which can be found below.
